org.apache.juneau.server.samples.addressbook

Class AddressBookResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.server.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.server.jena.RestServletJenaDefault
            • org.apache.juneau.microservice.ResourceJena
              • org.apache.juneau.server.samples.addressbook.AddressBookResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig

    @RestResource(path="/addressBook",messages="nls/AddressBookResource",properties={@Property(name="RestServlet.allowMethodParam",value="*"),@Property(name="HtmlSerializer.uriAnchorText",value="TO_STRING"),@Property(name="Serializer.quoteChar",value="\'"),@Property(name="Rdf.jena.rdfXml.tab",value="5"),@Property(name="RdfSerializer.addRootProperty",value="true"),@Property(name="HtmlDocSerializer.links",value="{up:\'$R{requestParentURI}\',options:\'$R{servletURI}?method=OPTIONS\',source:\'$R{servletParentURI}/source?classes=(org.apache.juneau.server.samples.addressbook.AddressBookResource,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.Address,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.AddressBook,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.CreateAddress,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.CreatePerson,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.IAddressBook,org.apache.juneau.samples.addressbook.Person)\'}"),@Property(name="Serializer.relativeUriBase",value="$R{servletURI}")},stylesheet="styles/devops.css",encoders=GzipEncoder.class)
public class AddressBookResource
extends ResourceJena
    Proof-of-concept resource that shows off the capabilities of working with POJO resources. Consists of an in-memory address book repository.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
